params.alt: Mimi Onouha Library of Missing Datasets
params.title: Why are some types of data not collected, and what does this say about our society? These are some of the questions Mimi Onouha questions wants you to ponder in her installation the Library of Missing Datasets

metadata.title: Mimi Onouha Library of Missing Datasets

params.alt: Maria Salguero Visualising Femicide in Mexico
params.title: Femicide happens often in Mexico but it is an issue that has not received enough attention from the authorities. Maria Salguero took matters into her own hands by collecting data and visualising the extent of this crime against women.

metadata.title: Maria Salguero Visualising Femicide in Mexico
